decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly combo off by using cards like Undercity Informer, Balustrade Spy, and Thassa's Oracle to quickly mill our library and win the game. The deck runs a lot of fast mana sources like Lotus Petal and Simian Spirit Guide to accelerate the combo. It also includes protection in the form of Pact of Negation and Thoughtseize to ensure that the combo goes off successfully. The inclusion of Agadeem's Awakening and Turntimber Symbiosis provide additional utility in finding combo pieces or protecting key creatures.
